slides.title: Indian History
slides.content:
**Freedom Struggle:**
- 1857: First War of Independence
- 1885: Indian National Congress formed
- 1930: Dandi March (Salt Satyagraha)
- 1942: Quit India Movement
- 1947: Independence on 15 August

**Leaders:** Gandhi, Nehru, Patel, Bose, Tilak

slides.title: Indian Geography
slides.content:
**India:**
- 28 States, 8 Union Territories
- Capital: New Delhi
- Neighbors: Pakistan, China, Nepal, Bhutan, Bangladesh, Myanmar
- Rivers: Ganga, Yamuna, Brahmaputra, Godavari
- Mountains: Himalayas, Western Ghats, Eastern Ghats

slides.title: General Science
slides.content:
**Physics:** Speed = Distance/Time, Force = Mass × Acceleration
**Chemistry:** H₂O (Water), CO₂ (Carbon Dioxide), O₂ (Oxygen)
**Biology:** Human body has 206 bones, Heart pumps blood, Lungs for breathing
**Vitamins:** A (eyes), B (energy), C (immunity), D (bones)

question.questionText: In which year did India gain independence?
question.explanation: India gained independence on August 15, 1947, from British rule after a long freedom struggle.
